snippet: The Kentucky Derby winner Animal Kingdom, the Preakness winner Shackleford and the Breeders’ Cup Dirt Mile winner Caleb’s Posse are finalists for 3-year-old champion male honors at the Eclipse Awards.
abstract: Kentucky Derby winner Animal Kingdom, Preakness winner Shackleford and Breeders’ Cup Dirt Mile winner Caleb’s Posse are finalists for 3-year-old champion male honors at the Eclipse Awards.
lead_paragraph: The Kentucky Derby winner Animal Kingdom, the Preakness winner Shackleford and the Breeders’ Cup Dirt Mile winner Caleb’s Posse are finalists for 3-year-old champion male honors at the Eclipse Awards.
